notifications.body:
Vaadin maintenance release 7.7.6 is available.

The release fixes 2 issues. Using 7.7.6 is recommended for all Vaadin 7 users.

With Maven, use Vaadin version 7.7.6, or just download the full package.
notifications.title: Vaadin Framework 7.7.6 released

notifications.body:
Vaadin Spreadsheet 1.3 Final is available

  • Uses Apache POI 3.15
  • Supports named ranges
  • Supports the SUBTOTAL function
  • Great performance boost for conditional formatting
notifications.title: Vaadin Spreadsheet 1.3 Final released

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?

notifications.body: Want to meet other Vaadin developers in Finland and hear the latest in good company while having something to eat and drink?
notifications.title: Join Meetup Group Finland
